answers.author: David Miller
answers.text:
Mark,
I actually was hired by a police department when it was formed after the city decided to end its contract with the county sheriff's department.  I will be happy to assist you with questions that you may have regarding the transition.  However, I would also recommend that you contact Law Enforcement Management Services.  They are a police consulting firm based here in Texas.  I have used them in the past and highly recommend them.  The gentleman that you may contact is Marlin Price.  He can be reached at either marlinprice@texaslems.com or 817-676-3023.  Please feel free to contact me at dmiller@ci.bedford.tx.us or 817-952-2106 if you would like to discuss your situation further.

answers.author: Leonard Matarese
answers.text:
The ICMA Center for Public Safety Management has provided extensive police, fire and EMS technical assistance in the past 3 years to over 70 communities ranging in size from Boone, IA to Indianapolis, IN.  
The team is comprised of national recognized public safety professionals, many of whom also have city manager experience; academics with prior police and fire experience and doctoral level public safety operations research experts. Thus we are able to combine extensive field operational background with a management perspective using data driven decision models. Our team is currently working on several projects involving creation of new police organizations. And, we have done numerous projects reviewing existing contractural relations between cities and sheriff's offices. For additional information you may contact me at Lmatarese@ICMA.org or Tom Wieczorek at Twieczorek@ICMA.org 
By the way both Tom and I are former police officers and city managers.

author: Mark Arentsen
text: The City of Bondurant is a small suburb of Des Moines, IA.  We currently contract for police services with the County Sheriff, but are looking into establishing a City police department.  I am looking for the names of consultants who could evaluate this for the City.  Can you send me a list, or where would I find that information?
title: Police Consultants
